snippet.title: The Sinking City 2 - Gameplay Reveal & Kickstarter Now Live!
snippet.description:
🔗 The Sinking City 2 Kickstarter is live! Back the project today to gain exclusive digital and physical rewards: https://kck.st/49CIBVR
👁️ Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2825860/The_Sinking_City_2/

Step into the flooded city of Arkham in this Lovecraftian survival horror video game, blending atmospheric exploration, brutal survival, and a deep investigative system in a world filled with cosmic horror and psychological dread. The Sinking City 2 will launch in 2025 on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

- Explore Arkham - Traverse flooded streets and abandoned mansions, uncovering secrets on foot or by boat.
- Survive against intelligent, unpredictable monsters - Every bullet counts and every encounter could be your last.
- Reworked combat & survival mechanics - Battle monsters using era-accurate weapons, crafting, and resource management to stay alive.
- Investigate at your own pace - No forced clue-hunting. Uncover Arkham’s mysteries your way.

The Sinking City 2 delivers a dark, oppressive world packed with challenging combat, environmental storytelling and mind-bending discoveries. No hand-holding. No safe spaces. Just you, the unknown, and the horror waiting to be uncovered.
